name: Spinny Monster
description:
Spinny Monster is a simple & very challenging and addictive game!!

Candy fall from top, rotate the monster to catch the candies they like, share the love with monsters...

Try to beat your high score and challenge your friends on Game Center and have fun :)

Features
~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Awesome Gameplay music
- Better sound effects
- Fun levels
- Game Center intergration
- Enjoy beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music
- Adorable , fun, and thoughtful design
- Social sharing of your score.

=====

Spinny Monster is only compatible with devices running iOS 10 or later.

=====
Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
